p: Among the essential oils prepared by different methods, the essential oil resulting from UMHD had the highest inhibition capacity (SC% = 18.12%) in Figure 12c. The inhibition capacity of linoleic acid oxidation by HD was 14.25%. Therefore, for the Î²-carotene-linoleic acid bleaching assay, a descending order of inhibition capacity of VC > DES UMHD > HD > BHA is shown.
